name: Soccer Kick!
description:
Dribble and shoot to score as many goals as possible - on both sides - for both teams!!! Are you up for the challenge?

Soccer Kick! is the cutest casual arcade game in sports history. Pixel style!

Features:
- Easy to learn one-tap controls
- Super fun hyper casual gameplay
- Haptic Feedback for compatible devices
- Leaderboards to challenge your friends
